text: Khatik Mohalla (colony, basti or village) is the name of village or locality where Hindu Khatik people live, and may refer to: *Khatik Mohalla (Bhilwara) *Khatik Colony (Okhla), Delhi *Khatik Basti (Panipat), Haryana *Khatik Mohalla (Ratia), Haryana *Khatik Mohalla (Meerut), Uttar Pradesh * Khatik Mohalla (Mathura Cantt), Uttar Pradesh *Khatik Mohalla (Jabalpur), Madhya Pradesh *Khatik Mohalla (Indore), Madhya Pradesh *Khatik Mohalla (Kalukheda), Madhya Pradesh *Khatik Colony (Bhopal) *Khatik Mohalla (Shahpura), Rajasthan **Khatik Mohalla Street *Khatik Basti (Ladnun), Rajasthan *Khatik Mohalla (Bijolia), Rajasthan *Khatik Mohalla (Karera), Rajasthan *Khatik Mohalla (Didwari), Rajasthan *Khatik Mohalla (Bambala), Jaipur, Rajasthan ==See also== *Khatik, an ethnic group *Khatik (surname)
title: Khatik Mohalla
